slide.title: Xdebug: Tracing Cont.
slide.blurb: The trace itself can be printed to screen via %xdebug_dump_function_trace()% or returned in a form of an array through %xdebug_get_function_trace()%.
The traces can be made even more informative, by enabling %xdebug.collect_params% option, which would make Xdebug display the arguments passed to every function.
